definition: ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment/also written 哪裡|哪里
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
what are you doing?/what's he up to?
suffix of a noun of locality
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
